3070.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|148|46$نَحْنُ|we|62|213|103$بِمُعَذَّبِينَ|(are) the ones to be punished."|229|304|13020$

3071.verse: فَكَذَّبُوهُ|So they denied him,|152|159|6500$فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ‌ۗ|then We destroyed them.|190|205|5430$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|85|58$فِى|in|48|63|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|79|28$لَأَيَةً‌ۖ|surely, is a sign,|128|135|2203$وَمَا|but not|69|125|46$كَانَ|are|57|170|913$أَكْثَرُهُم|most of them|108|221|937$مُّؤْمِنِينَ|believers.|93|149|879$

3072.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|112|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|110|586$لَهُوَ|surely, He|86|114|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|174|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|154|398$

3088.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|115|25$تَمَسُّوهَا|touch her|93|114|6542$بِسُوٓءٍ|with harm,|90|111|6543$فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ|lest seize you|111|132|6544$عَذَابُ|(the) punishment|134|155|5574$يَوْمٍ|(of) a Day|88|98|2331$عَظِيمٍ|Great."|75|75|3522$

3090.verse: فَأَخَذَهُمُ|So seized them|121|130|10181$ٱلْعَذَابُ‌ۗ|the punishment.|127|144|827$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|87|58$فِى|in|48|65|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|81|28$لَأَيَةً‌ۖ|surely is a sign,|123|140|2203$وَمَا|but not|69|78|46$كَانَ|are|57|159|913$أَكْثَرُهُم|most of them|108|312|937$مُّؤْمِنِينَ|believers.|93|195|879$

3069.verse: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,

3070.verse: And we are not to be punished."

3071.verse: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3072.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

3074.verse: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

3075.verse: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

3076.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3077.verse: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

3078.verse: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],

3080.verse: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?

3081.verse: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.

3082.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3083.verse: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,

3084.verse: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."

3085.verse: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.

3086.verse: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."

3087.verse: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.

3088.verse: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."

3089.verse: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.

3090.verse: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3091.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
